resources.string: I am currently giving my \"I like the way you move\' talk at %2$s %3$s
Merriam-Webster Student definition of \'Animate\' can be found at http://mark.al/2mx0LTB %3$s
The SVG path data spec is at http://mark.al/2lPSeMY and an intro to using in VectorDrawable is at http://bit.ly/13OzTlG %3$s
Jeb Stuart\'s Android Animation Interpolators article is available at http://mark.al/2narBCL %3$s
An example of a custom PathInterpolator is here: http://mark.al/2dNyjZq %3$s
For more information on Christmas Voice go to http://mark.al/2hOY12h and the app is available at http://mark.al/2nmGnq7
The presentation source is at http://bit.ly/sdIyBH and the articles are at http://bit.ly/1turq1F %3$s
Clippy: MS Office 97|Shared element transitions: too busy
